title: 4 Quick Ways to Delete Pins or Boards on Pinterest

steps.title: Open Pinterest.
steps.content: Open Pinterest. It's a red app with a white, stylized "P" on it. If you're logged into Pinterest, doing so will open the home page. If you aren't logged in, enter your email address and password, then tap Log In . You can only delete pins that you pinned yourself.

steps.title: Tap your profile icon.
steps.content: Tap your profile icon. This is the person-shaped button at the bottom-right corner.

steps.title: Tap the pin you want to unpin.
steps.content: Tap the pin you want to unpin. You can tap a board to look through a board, or tap Pins at the top to search individual pins. The pin should open in full-view.

steps.title: Tap ••• .
steps.content: Tap ••• . You can find this below the pin.

steps.title: Tap Edit Pin.
steps.content: Tap Edit Pin . This is the first option.

steps.title: Tap Delete this Pin.
steps.content: Tap Delete this Pin . This is in the pop-up menu.

steps.title: Tap Delete to confirm.
steps.content: Tap Delete to confirm. The pin will be deleted from your board or saves.

steps.title: Open Pinterest.
steps.content: Open Pinterest. It's a red app with a white, stylized "P" on it. If you're logged into Pinterest, doing so will open the home page.

steps.title: Tap your profile icon.
steps.content: Tap your profile icon. This is the person-shaped button at the bottom-right corner.

steps.title: Tap the board you want to edit.
steps.content: Tap the board you want to edit. If needed, use the search bar to quickly find boards.

steps.title: Tap ••• .
steps.content: Tap ••• . This is in the top-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Edit board and header image.
steps.content: Tap Edit board and header image . This is the first option.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Delete board.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Delete board . You can find this at the very bottom. Alternatively, you can make the board secret to keep it hidden from others.

steps.title: Tap Delete forever.
steps.content: Tap Delete forever . The board will be deleted permanently. If you want to recover the board, you'll need to add the pins again.

steps.title: Go to https://www.pinterest.com/.
steps.content: Go to https://www.pinterest.com/ . If you're already logged into Pinterest, this will open your home page.

steps.title: Click the "Profile" icon.

steps.content: Go to https://www.pinterest.com/ . If you're already logged into Pinterest, this will open your home page.

steps.title: Click the "Profile" icon.

steps.title: Click a board.
steps.content: Click a board. If needed, use the search bar to quickly find boards.

steps.title: Click ••• .

steps.title: Scroll down and click Delete board.
steps.content: Scroll down and click Delete board . This is at the very bottom of the pop-up window.

steps.content: Click Delete . The board will be deleted. You have 7 days to restore deleted boards in the Recently deleted section. After 7 days, it will be permanently deleted.
